Name: ZEscape
About the game: Two teams of players face off in ZEscape, the multiplayer game that has you running for your life from the relentless forces of the undead! Beat platforming challenges while defending and covering your teammates across challenging levels and bosses as the undead are chasing your delicious brains! Make your escape or become one of them! ..BRAINS! Zombie multiplayer mayhem at it's best! Features -Fast-paced brain splashing, fire-cracking, gun packing asymmetric multiplayer action -Zombie running and Survival game modes -Realistic and unrealistic level designs -Player gear customizations: -Hats -Sprays -Character Skins Class-based abilities: Support -Healer -Ammo -Shield DMG -Fire -Water -Air -Boss battles -Server browser -Dedicated servers -Pancakes -Good times -A sense of humor Connect with the developer and the ZEscape community on the official Discord!
Meta Title: ZEscape: Jul 20, 2018, Madhouse Software and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on ZEscape? Check out the release date (Jul 20, 2018), developer insights from Madhouse Software, and a complete game summary.
